text: The Sweden men's national ice hockey team () represents the country of Sweden in men's ice hockey. The team started in 1920. It won the world championships in 1953, 1957, 1962, 1987, 1991, 1992, 1998, 2006, 2013, 2017 and 2018. They also became Olympic champions in 1994 and 2006. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden Category:1920 establishments in Sweden Category:National ice hockey teams
title: Sweden men's national ice hockey team
